entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
